- [ ] Shop
- [ ] Product (PDP)
- [ ] Cart / Drawer
- [ ] Policies (privacy/terms/returns/shipping)
- [ ] Wholesale

- [ ] Thank-you page
- [ ] Mobile (iPhone-sized)
- [ ] Desktop

## Guardrails (USA Gummies)
- [ ] No pricing logic changes
- [ ] No free-shipping threshold changes
- [ ] No atomic inventory model changes
